post:
Dear visitor,

On behalf of Access2.IT Group B.V. (NL) we can provide IP spaces for a affordable price

IPv4 /24

  • 95,- EUR for monthly contract (45,- EUR setup)
  • 85,- EUR for 1 year contract (45,- EUR setup)
  • 75,- EUR for 2 year contract (no setup fees)

Information:

  • Set your own RIPE netname and description.
  • Verified companies can also have their own “Responsible organisation” and abuse handling.
  • We will assign the prefix as a “SUB-ALLOCATED PA”.
  • We do NOT provide IP addresses for spam and phishing

Our contact details:
